io.permazen.cli

Interface CliSession.Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRaftCommand.RaftAction, AbstractTransactionRaftCommand.RaftTransactionAction, EvalCommand.EvalAction, InfoCommand, QuitCommand, ShowImportsCommand, ShowVariablesCommand
    Enclosing class:
    CliSession
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface CliSession.Action
    Callback interface used by CliSession.performCliSessionAction() and CliSession.performCliSessionActionWithCurrentTransaction().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(CliSession session)
      Perform some action using the given CliSession while a transaction is open.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(CliSession session)
  throws Exception
        Perform some action using the given CliSession while a transaction is open.
        Parameters:
        session - session with open transaction
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs
